しゃしん picture; photograph: おにいさん [someone else's] older brother
まちがう to make a mistake
ゆうしょく dinner (lit., evening meal)
ひさしぶり for the first time in a long time
あつい hot (with reference to weather)
やくにたつ to be useful
しんぶんきじ newspaper article
ぜんぜん not at all
みなさん all of you
もとめる to request; to ask for
はいけい (formal greeting used at the beginning of a letter)
あたたかい pleasantly warm (with reference to weather)
こうよう fall colors [of leaves]
けいぐ Sincerely (used at the end of a letter)
さま Dear ~ (added to the name of the addressee at the end of a letter)
